en: In the meantime,
vi: In the meantime,

en: I'll just watch you rot away.
vi: I'll just watch you rot away.

en: SHUT UP! THAT'S ENOUGH!
vi: SHUT UP! THAT'S ENOUGH!

en: Whoever you are, GET OUT OF MY HEAD!
vi: Whoever you are, GET OUT OF MY HEAD!

en: My life… is my business… my decisions, are mine alone.
vi: My life… is my business… my decisions, are mine alone.

en: Please, let me out
vi: Please, let me out

en: Be strong
vi: Be strong

en: Let me out of this place. I know there's a way out, there has to be.
vi: Let me out of this place. I know there's a way out, there has to be.

en: Please…
vi: Please…

en: …I want to go home…
vi: …I want to go home…

en: That's more like it.
vi: That's more like it.

en: I… am not going to give you the reaction you want.
vi: I… am not going to give you the reaction you want.

en: …I'm better than that.
vi: …I'm better than that.

en: You think you can come here and torture me?
vi: You think you can come here and torture me?

en: If entertainment is what you want, then I'll just bore you to death.
vi: If entertainment is what you want, then I'll just bore you to death.

en: I hope you have a good book nearby.
vi: I hope you have a good book nearby.

en: Have it your way.
vi: Have it your way.

en: Do you like it? I think it's just what you need.
vi: Do you like it? I think it's just what you need.

en: Maybe now you will reflect on the stupidity of your actions.
vi: Maybe now you will reflect on the stupidity of your actions.

en: "How would you like to stay trapped in here until you die?"
vi: "How would you like to stay trapped in here until you die?"
